about_the_game:
Sword Sanctuary is a side-scrolling hardcore game focused on parrying.

Players can control a knight.

The knight came to the sanctuary of the sword connected to the world of characters with various weapons and skills to become a Swordmaster.

Defeat them all to earn the right to challenge the Sword Saint.

Overcome every opponent and claim the title of Swordmaster.

Players can move, evade, defend, and attack.

Defense can block in three directions: top, middle, and bottom.

Defending in the middle protects against attacks from the top and bottom as well, but it reduces damage more effectively when the direction of the attack matches the direction of the defense.

If you defend at the exact moment the enemy's attack lands, it triggers a parry, which damages the enemy and partially recovers your own health.

When the direction of the attack and defense match and you successfully parry, it causes greater damage to the enemy and restores more health.

Attacks deal less damage than parrying but can provoke enemy defenses and restrict their actions.

Controls

Move - Arrow Key

Dodge - Shift while moving

Attack - Space

Defense - W, A, S, D

   Top - W

   Middle - A, D

   Bottom - S
